attributes.action: The UK government to support Ukraine's aspiration to join the European Union
attributes.additional_details:
Ukraine is a democratic and sovereign country that overwhelming and unanimously wants to be apart of Europe and make it easier to share their culture and heritage with the rest of Europe. Since 1993, Ukraine's aspiration is to join the EU and has made significant strides in aligning their polices and laws to make it so!

“They share our values, they defend our principles. They want to have a peaceful democracy"

Ursula Von Der Leyen
President of the European Commission.
attributes.background: The UK government to show support for the admission of Ukraine into the European Union.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about admitting new members to the EU are a matter for EU, not the UK Government or Parliament.
